name: foxtructure_php
description: This is tool for automatic building a structure of project, depending basically on npm, gulp and sass.

scripts.foxtructure: npm run init:npm-install && npm run init:dirs && npm run init:files && cd app && php composer.phar install
scripts.init:dirs: mkdirp app/css app/fonts app/images app/js/libs app/vendor dev/scss/partials dev/js
scripts.init:files: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/index.php -o app/index.php && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/composer.json -o app/composer.json && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/php/mailer.php -o app/vendor/mailer.php && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/css/main.css -o app/css/main.css && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/scss/main.scss -o dev/scss/main.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/scss/reset.scss -o dev/scss/partials/_reset.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/scss/animate.scss -o dev/scss/partials/_animate.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/scss/variables.scss -o dev/scss/partials/_variables.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/scss/mixins.scss -o dev/scss/partials/_mixins.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/scss/layout.scss -o dev/scss/partials/_layout.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/js/main.js -o dev/js/main.js && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/js/rellax.min.js -o app/js/libs/rellax.min.js && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/foxtructure/foxtructure_php/master/gulpfile.js -o gulpfile.js && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/github/gitignore/master/Node.gitignore -o .gitignore

author: Adam Reszka
